title: Requirement Analysis
subtitle: STEP 01
desc: We understand the fabrication requirement, application, load conditions, drawings (if available), and site constraints. Our team evaluates technical feasibility, material specifications, and manufacturing requirements.

title: Design & Quotation
subtitle: STEP 02
desc: After finalizing scope and specifications, the project is confirmed through booking. A detailed agreement is prepared covering materials, quantities, timelines, payment terms, and quality standards.

title: Fabrication & Quality Check
subtitle: STEP 03
desc: Fabrication begins at our facility or on-site using high-precision tools. We strictly follow quality standards for cutting, welding, and finishing. Regular inspections ensure structural integrity and durability.

title: Installation & Erection
subtitle: STEP 04
desc: Our skilled workforce handles the safe transportation and erection of purely fabricated structures. We ensure precise alignment, bolting, and on-site welding for a seamless fit.

title: Finishing & Handover
subtitle: STEP 05
desc: The structure undergoes final finishing, including anti-rust coating and painting. After a final joint inspection with the client, the project is officially handed over.
